entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 then light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
